name: Alphabet Game
description:
With this game you can learn how to read russian letters
guess where 2 similar letters are hidden, there's 33 letters in russian and you can simply learn how they're spelled
you'll be able to read almost any russian word or write any english word with russian letters

it's made with Unreal 4 and thus needs pretty modern video card.

try web http://alpha.symbiants.com/alpha.html
